publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6919 Pauline McNeill: Call for an Edwin Morgan Memorial—That the Parliament supports the proposal to erect a statue of Edwin Morgan on Byres Road in Glasgow’s west end; notes his success as the author of over 50 published books; believes that his reputation is world renowned and recognises his achievements as Glasgow’s first poet laureate and as Scotland’s first Makar; further notes that Morgan studied and taught at the University of Glasgow, and considers that it would be fitting to have a memorial in this area. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-6919 Call for an Edwin Morgan Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-6919 Call for an Edwin Morgan Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2010) Jack McConnell*
S3M-6919 Call for an Edwin Morgan Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2010) Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-6919 Pauline McNeill: Call for an Edwin Morgan Memorial—That the Parliament supports the proposal to erect a statue of Edwin Morgan on Byres Road in Glasgow’s west end; notes his success as the author of over 50 published books; believes that his reputation is world renowned and recognises his achievements as Glasgow’s first poet laureate and as Scotland’s first Makar; further notes that Morgan studied and taught at the University of Glasgow, and considers that it would be fitting to have a memorial in this area. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack, Jack McConnell, Dr Richard Simpson
S3M-6919 Call for an Edwin Morgan Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2010) David Stewart*
